## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                   | Type                             | Default    |
| ------------ | ------------ | ----------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`       | `size`       | The size of the link.         | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'` |
| `standalone` | `standalone` | Is the link standalone or not | `boolean`                        | `false`    |
